metadata.description: Based on the Award Winning short film. The Pit and the Pendulum is an adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe's classic story of condemnation, hope and redemption. The comic book version of Poe's story borrows images from the award-winning stop motion animated film, The Pit and the Pendulum, executive produced by the legendary Ray Harryhausen.
metadata.name: Ray Harryhausen Presents: Pit and the Pendulum
